i was on the funny beach and now i am flying at the speed of light.

help

You don't need me to tell you how much of a CLASSIC this game is. "This game is a great adventure/combat/story game and everyone should play it!" Everyone who's played this game and liked it will tell you that. Listen. Just fucking play it, this game is the Shakespeare of gaming. Even after completing this game 5 times i still play it casually. Oh and trust me, if you have a friend who is willing to watch you stream this THEY WILL NOT REGRET IT. I had a friend who watched me play this through (episodes included) and now he is a huge Half-Life fan. Overall just PLAY IT. ITS FUUUUUUNNNNN.
One of the best games of all time. 11/10
cult classic, and i can finally see why

Half Life 2 Is a pretty good game. I recommend it. It has a good story, characters and overall game play.
It's a great sequel to a very old game, the graphics definitely have not aged since 2004 but for that time. It looks so great!
play as a mute scientist wearing a nuke-proof armor to fight the aliens that have conquered the earth while you were away somewhere with a crowbar
Really good classic, a must play.
I highly recommend this game to anyone, a must-play.
Surprised I haven't reviewed this one yet. A legendary game that has withstood the test of time.

Huge Half Life fan here. I just love half life and its story. The game is something that everybody should enjoy.
Half Life will never grow old.
It will always be stored in our hearts and memories.
Half life 2 is a personal favourite, Much more open environment than the first one, Sometimes the game can get tricky with the puzzles.
Anyway,  Half life is definitely at the top of my favourites list.

This is the greatest valve game I have ever played. It takes the creativity of portal and applies it to the fast paced genre of first person shooting. The game pushes you along using its quick tempo drum and bass soundtrack which always kicks in at the most suspenseful moments. The sound design in this game is incredible. The arsenal of weapons Gordon Freeman has at his disposal is what really makes this experience unforgettable. So much time is spent toying with the gravity gun and crowbar-ing everything in sight. Almost every object has its own physics and weight, A truly unique experience that only Valve could muster up. I'm disappointed in myself for not playing this sooner.
